Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Petit Palace Germanías places you in the heart of Valencia, minutes from Plaza de Toros and close to City of Arts and Sciences. This hotel is within close proximity of Plaza del Ayuntamiento and Valencia Town Hall.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 41 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge). This hotel also features a television in the lobby and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a computer station, and express check-out.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is Noon
Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Plaza de Toros - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Plaza del Ayuntamiento - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Valencia Town Hall - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Museo Valenciano de la Illustracion y la Modernidad - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
University of Valencia - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Plaza Patriarca - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
National Museum of Ceramics - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Palacio del Marques de Dos Aguas - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Puerta del Mar - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Santa Catalina Church and Tower - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Plaza de la Reina - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Central Market - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
La Lonja - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Puente de la Exposicion - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Saint Mary of Valencia Cathedral - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi

The preferred airport for Petit Palace Germanías is Valencia (VLC) - 9 km / 5.6 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Petit Palace Germanias Valencia is Valencia (VLC) - 9 km / 5.6 mi.
